entities.name: muggle women
entities.description: Refers to the group of people who are not wizards or witches. They wear trousers according to the Ministry wizard.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: The Ministry wizard who brandished the pinstriped trousers and told Archie that men do not wear them.

entities.name: archie
entities.description: Old Archie who refused to put on the pinstriped trousers saying he likes a healthy breeze around his privates.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione who was overcome with laughter at Archie's comment and had to duck out of the queue.

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: The old captain of Harry's House Quidditch team who introduced Harry to his parents' tent and told him about being signed to the Puddlemere United reserve team.

entities.name: puddlemere united
entities.description: A sports team that Oliver Wood has been signed to as a reserve player.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character who was introduced to Oliver Wood's parents' tent and told about his signing with Puddlemere United.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: A Hufflepuff fourth year student who hailed Harry and Ron in the campsite.

entities.name: hufflepuff house
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts that Ernie Macmillan is a part of.

relationships.description: According to Arthur Weasley, muggle women wear trousers.
Arthur Weasley said that men do not wear the pinstriped trousers.
Oliver Wood told Harry that he has been signed to Puddlemere United as a reserve player.
Ernie Macmillan hailed Harry in the campsite.
